about_the_game:
This set of assets allows you to add stores and decorations to the streetscape of the " SERIALGAMES LivingGoodCity Tileset". By adding convenience stores and fashionable stores, you can add more color to the streetscape.

It consists of tiles A4 and B.
Also included are three time-based scene patterns for the above tile sets: day, evening, and night.
Enjoy creating various effects by composing your own situation patterns!
The day, evening, and night time variations are also included, so you can also create effects time-axis based effects!
You can also expand the world view by combining with the " SERIALGAMES LivingGoodCity Tileset".

You can use this set even if you do not have the " SERIALGAMES LivingGoodCity Tileset".


■Included assets

Tile B, A4 (Total 6 sheets with day, evening and night patterns)

Tile A4: 12 building patterns
Tile B: Various store materials (convenience stores, second-hand clothing stores, yakitori shops, bakeries, etc.), post boxes, fences, manholes, signboards, signs, table sets, etc.

Day, evening, and night versions of the above tile sets are also included.

Sample maps (project data) included.


-------

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
This set of assets allows you to add stores and decorations to the streetscape of the " SERIALGAMES LivingGoodCity Tileset". By adding convenience stores and fashionable stores, you can add more color to the streetscape.

It consists of tiles A4 and B.
Also included are three time-based scene patterns for the above tile sets: day, evening, and night.
Enjoy creating various effects by composing your own situation patterns!
The day, evening, and night time variations are also included, so you can also create effects time-axis based effects!
You can also expand the world view by combining with the " SERIALGAMES LivingGoodCity Tileset".

You can use this set even if you do not have the " SERIALGAMES LivingGoodCity Tileset".


■Included assets

Tile B, A4 (Total 6 sheets with day, evening and night patterns)

Tile A4: 12 building patterns
Tile B: Various store materials (convenience stores, second-hand clothing stores, yakitori shops, bakeries, etc.), post boxes, fences, manholes, signboards, signs, table sets, etc.

Day, evening, and night versions of the above tile sets are also included.

Sample maps (project data) included.


-------

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
